tool_description: Tracks research articles of all types.
name: Article Tracker
title: Article Tracker

api_list.name: Production
api_list.description: This is the production endpoint for the article tracker.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://article-tracker.p.rapidapi.com/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "article-tracker.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://article-tracker.p.rapidapi.com/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "article-tracker.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
